General.Name: Green Bridge Industries Inc
General.Description: Green Bridge Industries, Inc. offers non-toxic, environmentally friendly cleaning products to fit the sanitation needs of the medical, fund raising, agricultural, military, and retail markets. The company's products include Zap stain remover pens. It markets its products through brokerage firms, direct sales efforts, resellers, and distributors, as well as through e-commerce Web site. The company was formerly known as NXGen Holdings, Inc. and changed its name to Green Bridge Industries, Inc. in August 2009. Green Bridge Industries, Inc. was founded in 2005 and is based in Ridgewood, New Jersey.
General.Address: 310 Godwin Avenue, Ridgewood, NJ, United States, 07450
